item.description:
We're trying another mid-week play date for Meetup folks... If you can make it, we'd love to see you! If not, but if there IS a mid-week day that works for you please do let me know!!

This will be just a time to get together and play! Bring ATCs or journal or chunky pages or whatever else you're working on. There's table space, some shared supplies, coffee, free parking, and all the other amenities of ArtStudio 360 in Holliston. Come and play!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Open Studio Monday/ Play Day!
